description:
Whatever the weather, the committed just get out and ride. The Momentum short is built tough and designed for all conditions.
A durable micro grid outer and soft merino lining will regulate temperature and stretch so you can turn the pedals without any added resistance.
name: Mons Royale Momentum 2.0 Bike Shorts - Mens

specs.value: Double Weave Micro Grid - 52% Polyester, 39% Merino Wool, 9% Spandex, 255 gsm
